snippet.title: January Progress Report | True Love For Her | Yandere Simulator Android & PC Inspired Game
snippet.description:
☆------------------------☆
(TLFH) True Love For Her is a Yandere game inspired by Yandere Simulator that does not compete with the game. This game involves murdering, and other methods of killing, this game is not meant for kids or sensible people, we are not responsible for any actions with kids replicating stuff in real life from TLFH.

The protagonist that you're playing as is Kurai Hana, a young highschooler. Ever since she was little, she never interacted with any friends in school, she would identify herself as a non-existent ghost. When highschool got into her life, it felt the same, until... One day, while rushing to school she crashed into a young girl, called Delena. After talking to Delena for 4 months, everything changed for her, she began realizing she's not a ghost anymore. One day, while walking to the school corridors, she would find a situation where somebody keept bullying Delena. Your objective now is to get rid of them per week until you can confess your love towards delena without any distraction between Kurai (you) and Delena.
☆------------------------☆
https://ayanoaishihouse.home.blog/
·If you're wondering why the version you just downloaded isn't new,  it's because you're playing the old version. If it was new, I would have announced it, right?. I guess you can read...
☆------------------------☆
If you have any question about the game, here is discord link:
https://discord.gg/a6XzreafTh

Any questions about the game or just want to talk to me in general?

·itsmiiii
·ayanodevoficial@gmail.com
☆-------------------------☆
Fair Use Disclaimer:

☆-------------------------☆
